versions.name: Initial version
versions.summary: The first version of the console was a front loading system that was only released in Japan and had 25,000 models made. A top loading model was soon released and sold internationally. Both suffered from long loading times.
versions.cpu: Motorola 68000 running at 12 MHz with a Zilog Z80 running at 4 MHz Co-processor
versions.memory: 7Mb of DRAM; 512K of VRAM; and 64K of SRAM
